name: Stylish Headphones
description: Experience immersive audio with our stylish, noise-cancelling headphones. Perfect for music lovers and professionals alike. Features include long battery life, ergonomic design, and crystal-clear sound.

name: Smartwatch Pro
description: Stay connected and track your fitness with the Smartwatch Pro. It offers heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, notifications, and customizable watch faces. Waterproof and durable.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair
description: Designed for ultimate comfort and support during long working hours. Features adjustable lumbar support, breathable mesh, and a sturdy five-point base. Improve your posture and productivity.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Powerful sound in a compact design, ideal for outdoor adventures or home use. Enjoy rich bass and clear highs with extended battery life. Connects wirelessly via Bluetooth.

name: Premium Coffee Maker
description: Brew your favorite coffee with ease and precision. Features programmable settings, a thermal carafe to keep coffee hot, and a sleek, modern design that complements any kitchen.

name: HD Webcam
description: Crystal clear video calls and streaming with autofocus and a wide-angle lens. Perfect for remote work, online classes, and connecting with friends and family. Easy plug-and-play setup.

name: Gaming Laptop Pro
description: High-performance gaming laptop with RTX graphics and fast refresh rate display. Ideal for serious gamers and creative professionals.

name: Wireless Ergonomic Mouse
description: Comfortable and precise wireless mouse designed for long hours of use, reducing wrist strain.

name: 4K Smart TV
description: Immersive 4K UHD viewing experience with smart features, access to streaming apps, and voice control.

name: Robot Vacuum Cleaner
description: Intelligent robot vacuum with powerful suction and smart mapping, keeps your home spotless effortlessly.

name: Air Fryer XL
description: Cook healthier meals with less oil. Large capacity air fryer for families, with multiple presets.

name: Blender & Smoothie Maker
description: High-speed blender for smoothies, soups, and sauces. Easy to clean and durable construction.

name: Stainless Steel Cookware Set
description: Durable and elegant stainless steel cookware set for all your culinary needs. Compatible with induction.

name: Luxury Silk Scarf
description: Elegant 100% silk scarf, perfect for adding a touch of sophistication to any outfit. Available in multiple colors.

name: Men's Classic Leather Wallet
description: Genuine leather wallet with multiple card slots and a sleek, minimalist design. Durable and stylish.

name: Women's Summer Dress
description: Light and airy floral summer dress, perfect for casual outings or beach holidays. Comfortable fit.

name: Unisex Running Shoes
description: Lightweight and breathable running shoes providing excellent comfort and support for daily runs.

name: Fantasy Novel Series
description: Embark on an epic journey with this best-selling fantasy novel series. A must-read for adventurers.

name: Beginner's Coding Book
description: Learn to code from scratch with this easy-to-follow guide, perfect for aspiring developers.

name: Mystery Thriller
description: A gripping mystery that will keep you on the edge of your seat until the very last page.

name: Yoga Mat Pro
description: Premium non-slip yoga mat designed for ultimate grip and comfort during your practice. Eco-friendly material.

name: Camping Tent (2-Person)
description: Lightweight and durable 2-person camping tent, easy to set up for your outdoor adventures.

name: Hiking Backpack
description: Ergonomic hiking backpack with multiple compartments and hydration compatibility for long treks.

name: Resistance Band Set
description: Versatile resistance band set for full-body workouts, perfect for home gyms or on-the-go fitness.

name: Organic Moisturizer
description: Deeply hydrating organic facial moisturizer with natural ingredients for healthy, glowing skin.

name: Aromatherapy Diffuser
description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with ambient light, creates a calming and fragrant atmosphere.

name: Vitamin C Serum
description: Potent Vitamin C serum for brighter, more even skin tone and anti-aging benefits.

name: Luxury Bath Bomb Set
description: Indulge in a relaxing bath experience with this set of beautifully crafted, scented bath bombs.
